faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Kaiper products and services.

q1.question: How do I use the 3in1 Waist Fan?
q1.answer: Attach it to your waist belt or clip, then press the power button. Adjust the wind speed with the stepless slider. You can switch to neckband mode or connect a USB-C cable to use it as a power bank.

q2.question: How long does the battery last?
q2.answer: The 4,500mAh battery lasts up to 8 hours on low speed. It supports USB-C fast charging and fully charges in about 2 hours.

q3.question: Is it waterproof?
q3.answer: It has IP54 dust and water resistance. It can handle sweat and light rain, but avoid submerging it in water.

q4.question: Is the Cooling Kit sold separately?
q4.answer: Yes, the Cooling Kit (arm sleeves, cool towel hoodie, ice pack, cooling wear) is available separately. Using it with the 3in1 Waist Fan maximizes the cooling effect.

q5.question: Are there bulk purchase discounts?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer bulk purchase discount programs for enterprise customers. Please email contact@kaiper.io or reach out via our KakaoTalk channel.

q6.question: How long does shipping take?
q6.answer: Domestic orders ship within 2-3 business days after payment. Enterprise bulk orders are scheduled separately.
